page.title: 20BROMYARD PARISH CHURCH
page.content:
About 110 people per week attend services at{St. Peter's Church}and Reverend Gould conducts on average 14 weddings per year. Many activities are connected with the church such as {Mothers' Union, Pram Service, Prayer {Group, Bell-ringing, Young Christians and{Choir Practice. As well as normal parish commitments, the church has close links with the{hospital, local {education}and the{unemployed}where 6 young unemployed trainees, under supervision, carry out{community {projects. {
This project has been prepared by {3rd Year pupils and staff}at the{Queen {Elizabeth High School, Bromyard.
